abstract: What kinds of activities do you tend to engage in on Facebook? How much time do you typically spend on the site?
snippet: What kinds of activities do you tend to engage in on Facebook? How much time do you typically spend on the site?
lead_paragraph: Research shows that for students, specific ways of using Facebook - not use of it in general - correlate with some real-life behaviors like participating in extracurricular activities and even with academic achievement. How do you tend to use Facebook, if at all? Do you think the ways you use it are reflected in other areas of your life?
